title: Mayura Mohana: Diamond & Coral Pendant
materials: CZ Stones. Exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This pendant features a stylized peacock (Mayura), a symbol of beauty and grace, meticulously crafted in gold. The design incorporates delicate floral motifs and is studded with sparkling CZ stones. Three vibrant coral beads dangle gracefully below, adding a pop of color and traditional charm.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Sankranthi
or a traditional half-saree function. Can also be styled for contemporary events
adding a touch of cultural heritage to your look.
description: This pendant seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities. The peacock motif holds cultural significance, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. The combination of gold, coral, and sparkling CZ stones creates a captivating visual appeal. The high-quality craftsmanship ensures durability and longevity, making it a treasured heirloom.
